testcase.name: Create Article
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://conduit.productionready.io/api/' ....................... passed Given path 'users/login' .................................................. passed And request {"user":{"email":"karatetestuser@gmail.com","password":"karatetestuser"}} . passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def token = response.user.token ......................................... passed Given header Authorization = 'Token ' + token ............................. passed Given path 'articles' ..................................................... passed And request {"article":{"tagList":[],"title":"Testing","description":"This Article is for testing","body":"Test class"}} . passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then match response.article.title == 'Testing' ............................ passed
